snippet: Rafael Nadal is cutting short his 2016 season so he can fully recover from a left wrist injury....
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal is cutting short his 2016 season so he can fully recover from a left wrist injury.

headline.print_headline: Nadal Puts End to 2016 Season Because of Left Wrist Injury
headline.main: Nadal Puts End to 2016 Season Because of Left Wrist Injury
